blocks.name: xpf1o
blocks.content: Construct a bijection on a Cartesian product given bijections on the factors. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpf1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1o(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, cop(c2, c3)), cxp(c0, c1), cxp(c4, c5)))

  -| wi(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s1, c1, c3), c1, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

blocks.name: xpen
blocks.content: Equinumerosity law for Cartesian product. Proposition 4.22(b) of [Mendelson] p. 254. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpen(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3)), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cen, cxp(c1, c3)))
} = {
  syl2anc(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3)), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cen, cxp(c1, c3)), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c3)), wbr(cxp(c1, c3), cdom, cxp(c0, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(c2, cen, c3)), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c3)), wbr(cxp(c0, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c2)), wbr(cxp(c1, c2), cdom, cxp(c1, c3)))

thm xpen(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c2[≅]c3)→(c0 × c2)[≅](c1 × c3))
} = {
  syl2anc((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c2[≅]c3), (c0 × c2)[≅](c1 × c3), (c0 × c2)[≼](c1 × c3), (c1 × c3)[≼](c0 × c2))
  syl2anc((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c2[≅]c3), (c0 × c2)[≼](c1 × c3), (c0 × c2)[≼](c1 × c2), (c1 × c2)[≼](c1 × c3))
  syl2anr(c0[≅]c1, c2[≅]c3, (c0 × c2)[≼](c1 × c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0[≼]c1)
  brrelex1i(c2, cen, c3)
  endom(c0, c1)
  xpdom1g(c2, universe, c0, c1)
  syl2an(c0[≅]c1, c2[≅]c3, (c1 × c2)[≼](c1 × c3), c1 ∈ 𝕌, c2[≼]c3)
  brrelex2i(c0, cen, c1)
  endom(c2, c3)
  xpdom2g(c1, universe, c2, c3)
  domtr((c0 × c2), (c1 × c2), (c1 × c3))
  syl2anc((c0[≅]c1 ∧ c2[≅]c3), (c1 × c3)[≼](c0 × c2), (c1 × c3)[≼](c0 × c3), (c0 × c3)[≼](c0 × c2))
  syl2anr(c0[≅]c1, c2[≅]c3, (c1 × c3)[≼](c0 × c3), c3 ∈ 𝕌, c1[≼]c0)
  brrelex2i(c2, cen, c3)
  syl(c0[≅]c1, c1[≼]c0, c1[≅]c0)
  ensym(c0, c1)
  endom(c1, c0)
  xpdom1g(c3, universe, c1, c0)
  syl2an(c0[≅]c1, c2[≅]c3, (c0 × c3)[≼](c0 × c2), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c3[≼]c2)
  brrelex1i(c0, cen, c1)
  relen()
  syl(c2[≅]c3, c3[≼]c2, c3[≅]c2)
  ensym(c2, c3)
  endom(c3, c2)
  xpdom2g(c0, universe, c3, c2)
  domtr((c1 × c3), (c0 × c3), (c0 × c2))
  sbth((c0 × c2), (c1 × c3))
}

blocks.name: mapen
blocks.content: Two set exponentiations are equinumerous when their bases and exponents are equinumerous. Theorem 6H(c) of [Enderton] p. 139. (Contributed by NM, 16-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

  cocan1(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cv(hs2), c2, ccom(ccnv(cv(hs0)), ccom(cv(hs3), cv(hs1))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wf1o(cv(hs1), c2, c3)), wa(wf(cv(hs2), c2, c0), wf(cv(hs3), c3, c1))), wb(wceq(ccom(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), ccom(ccom(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), ccnv(cv(hs1))), cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs3), ccom(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), ccnv(cv(hs1))))), wfo(cv(hs1), c2, c3), wfn(cv(hs3), c3), wfn(ccom(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), ccnv(cv(hs1))), c3))
  adantr(wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wf1o(cv(hs1), c2, c3)), wa(wf(cv(hs2), c2, c0), wf(cv(hs3), c3, c1)), wfo(cv(hs1), c2, c3))
  adantl(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wf1o(cv(hs1), c2, c3), wfo(cv(hs1), c2, c3))

  ad2antll(wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wf1o(cv(hs1), c2, c3)), wf(cv(hs2), c2, c0), wf(cv(hs3), c3, c1), wfn(cv(hs3), c3))
  ffn(cv(hs3), c3, c1)
  ffnd(ccom(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), ccnv(cv(hs1))), c3, c1, wa(wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wf1o(cv(hs1), c2, c3)), wa(wf(cv(hs2), c2, c0), wf(cv(hs3), c3, c1))))
  adantrr(wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wf1o(cv(hs1), c2, c3)), wf(cv(hs2), c2, c0), wf(cv(hs3), c3, c1), wf(ccom(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), ccnv(cv(hs1))), c3, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wf1o(cv(hs1), c2, c3)), wf(cv(hs2), c2, c0)), wf(ccom(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), ccnv(cv(hs1))), c3, c1), wf(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c2, c1), wf(ccnv(cv(hs1)), c3, c2))
  sylan(wa(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wf1o(cv(hs1), c2, c3)), wf(cv(hs2), c2, c0), wf(ccom(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), c2, c1), wf(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  adantr(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wf1o(cv(hs1), c2, c3), wf(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  f1of(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  fco(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cv(hs2), c2)

  diff.hs1.w(wbr(co(c0, cmap, c2), cen, co(c1, cmap, c3)))

blocks.name: mapdom1
blocks.content: Order-preserving property of set exponentiation. Theorem 6L(c) of [Enderton] p. 149. (Contributed by NM, 27-Jul-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapdom1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmap, c2), cdom, co(c1, cmap, c2)))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmap, c2), cdom, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  exlimddv(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)), wbr(co(c0, cmap, c2), cdom, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wa(wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  adantr(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  ibi(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))))
  syl(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wb(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))), wcel(c1, universe))
  domeng(hs0, c1, universe, c0)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)), wa(wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, c2), cdom, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wbr(co(c0, cmap, c2), cen, co(cv(hs0), cmap, c2)), wbr(co(cv(hs0), cmap, c2), cdom, co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  syl2anr(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)), wa(wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wbr(co(c0, cmap, c2), cen, co(cv(hs0), cmap, c2)), wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, cen, c2))
  simpl(wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  adantl(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wbr(c2, cen, c2))
  enrefg(c2, universe)
  mapen(c0, cv(hs0), c2, c2)
  mpsyl(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)), wa(wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))), wbr(co(cv(hs0), cmap, c2), cdom, co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(co(c1, cmap, c2), universe), wss(co(cv(hs0), cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)), wa(wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))), wss(co(cv(hs0), cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)), wcel(c1, universe), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  ad2antrr(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe), wa(wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  brrelex2i(c0, cdom, c1)
  reldom()
  simprr(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)), wbr(c0, cen, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  mapss(c1, universe, cv(hs0), c2)
  ssdomg(co(c1, cmap, c2), universe, co(cv(hs0), cmap, c2))
  endomtr(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(cv(hs0), cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2))
  syl6eqbr(co(c0, cmap, c2), cdom, co(c1, cmap, c2), emptycls, wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wn(wcel(c2, universe))))
  adantl(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wceq(co(c0, cmap, c2), emptycls))
  eq0rdv(hs0, co(c0, cmap, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  con3i(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  simprd(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  elmapex(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  0dom(co(c1, cmap, c2))
  ovex(c1, cmap, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(co(c0, cmap, c2), cdom, co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cmap, c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mapdom1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[≼]c1 →(c0[↦]c2)[≼](c1[↦]c2))
} = {
  pm2.61dan(c0[≼]c1, (c0[↦]c2)[≼](c1[↦]c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  exlimddv(hs0, (c0[≼]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), (c0[↦]c2)[≼](c1[↦]c2), (c0[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))
  adantr(c0[≼]c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(hs0,(c0[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))
  ibi(c0[≼]c1, ∃(hs0,(c0[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)))
  syl(c0[≼]c1, (c0[≼]c1 ↔ ∃(hs0,(c0[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  domeng(hs0, c1, universe, c0)
  syl2anc(((c0[≼]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌)∧(c0[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)), (c0[↦]c2)[≼](c1[↦]c2), (c0[↦]c2)[≅](hs0[↦]c2), (hs0[↦]c2)[≼](c1[↦]c2))
  syl2anr((c0[≼]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), (c0[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1), (c0[↦]c2)[≅](hs0[↦]c2), c0[≅]hs0, c2[≅]c2)
  simpl(c0[≅]hs0, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  adantl(c0[≼]c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c2[≅]c2)
  enrefg(c2, universe)
  mapen(c0, hs0, c2, c2)
  mpsyl(((c0[≼]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌)∧(c0[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)), (hs0[↦]c2)[≼](c1[↦]c2), (c1[↦]c2)∈ 𝕌, (hs0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2))
  syl2anc(((c0[≼]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌)∧(c0[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1)), (hs0[↦]c2)⊆(c1[↦]c2), c1 ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  ad2antrr(c0[≼]c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[≅]hs0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex2i(c0, cdom, c1)
  reldom()
  simprr((c0[≼]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), c0[≅]hs0, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  mapss(c1, universe, hs0, c2)
  ssdomg((c1[↦]c2), universe, (hs0[↦]c2))
  endomtr((c0[↦]c2), (hs0[↦]c2), (c1[↦]c2))
  syl6eqbr((c0[↦]c2), cdom, (c1[↦]c2), emptycls, (c0[≼]c1 ∧ ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  adantl(c0[≼]c1, ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[↦]c2)= ∅)
  eq0rdv(hs0, (c0[↦]c2), ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  con3i(c2 ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈(c0[↦]c2))
  simprd(hs0 ∈(c0[↦]c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elmapex(hs0, c0, c2)
  0dom((c1[↦]c2))
  ovex(c1, cmap, c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[≼]c1 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  diff.hs0.w((c0[↦]c2)[≼](c1[↦]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[↦]c2))
  diff.hs0.w(¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
}

blocks.name: mapxpen
blocks.content: Equinumerosity law for double set exponentiation. Proposition 10.45 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 96. (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2015.)

thm mapxpen(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wbr(co(co(c0, cmap, c2), cmap, c4), cen, co(c0, cmap, cxp(c2, c4))))
} = {
  en3d(hs0, hs1, co(co(c0, cmap, c2), cmap, c4), co(c0, cmap, cxp(c2, c4)), cmpo(hs2, hs3, c2, c4, cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2))), cmpt(hs3, c4, cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  ovexd(co(c0, cmap, c2), cmap, c4, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  ovexd(c0, cmap, cxp(c2, c4), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  syl5ibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, cmap, c2), cmap, c4)), wcel(cmpo(hs2, hs3, c2, c4, cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2))), co(c0, cmap, cxp(c2, c4))), wf(cmpo(hs2, hs3, c2, c4, cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2))), cxp(c2, c4), c0))
  sylib(wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, cmap, c2), cmap, c4)), wf(cmpo(hs2, hs3, c2, c4, cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2))), cxp(c2, c4), c0), wral(hs2, c2, wral(hs3, c4, wcel(cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), c0))))
  ralrimiva(hs2, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, cmap, c2), cmap, c4)), wral(hs3, c4, wcel(cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), c0)))
  ralrimiva(hs3, c4, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, cmap, c2), cmap, c4)), wcel(cv(hs2), c2)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), c0))
  an32s(wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, cmap, c2), cmap, c4)), wcel(cv(hs2), c2), wcel(cv(hs3), c4), wcel(cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), c0))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs2), c2, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(co(c0, cmap, c2), cmap, c4)), wcel(cv(hs3), c4)))
  fmpt2(hs2, hs3, c2, c4, cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2)), c0, cmpo(hs2, hs3, c2, c4, cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wcel(cmpo(hs2, hs3, c2, c4, cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2))), co(c0, cmap, cxp(c2, c4))), wf(cmpo(hs2, hs3, c2, c4, cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2))), cxp(c2, c4), c0)), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cxp(c2, c4), universe))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wcel(cxp(c2, c4), universe))
  xpexg(c2, c3, c4, c5)
  elmapg(c0, c1, cxp(c2, c4), universe, cmpo(hs2, hs3, c2, c4, cfv(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cv(hs2))))
  sylibrd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, cxp(c2, c4))), wcel(cmpt(hs3, c4, cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))), co(co(c0, cmap, c2), cmap, c4)), wf(cmpt(hs3, c4, cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))), c4, co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, cxp(c2, c4))), wf(cmpt(hs3, c4, cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))), c4, co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  fmpttd(hs3, c4, cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3))), co(c0, cmap, c2), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, cxp(c2, c4)))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cmap, cxp(c2, c4)))), wcel(cv(hs3), c4)), wcel(cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3))), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wf(cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3))), c2, c0))

  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wcel(cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3))), co(c0, cmap, c2)), wf(cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3))), c2, c0)))
  elmapg(c0, c1, c2, c3, cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3))))
  sylancr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wcel(cmpt(hs3, c4, cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))), co(co(c0, cmap, c2), cmap, c4)), wf(cmpt(hs3, c4, cmpt(hs2, c2, co(cv(hs2), cv(hs1), cv(hs3)))), c4, co(c0, cmap, c2))), wcel(co(c0, cmap, c2), universe), wcel(c4, c5))
  ovex(c0, cmap, c2)

blocks.name: xpmapen
blocks.content: Equinumerosity law for set exponentiation of a Cartesian product. Exercise 4.47 of [Mendelson] p. 255. (Contributed by NM, 23-Feb-2004.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm xpmapen(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wbr(co(cxp(c0, c1), cmap, c2), cen, cxp(co(c0, cmap, c2), co(c1, cmap, c2)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
} = {
  xpmapenlem(hs2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, cmpt(hs3, c2, cfv(c1st, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)))), cmpt(hs3, c2, cfv(c2nd, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)))), cmpt(hs3, c2, cop(cfv(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), cfv(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)))))
  cbvmptv(hs3, hs2, c2, cfv(c1st, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3))), cfv(c1st, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  2fveq3(cv(hs3), cv(hs2), c1st, cv(hs0))
  cbvmptv(hs3, hs2, c2, cfv(c2nd, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3))), cfv(c2nd, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  2fveq3(cv(hs3), cv(hs2), c2nd, cv(hs0))
  cbvmptv(hs3, hs2, c2, cop(cfv(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), cfv(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3))), cop(cfv(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)), cfv(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), cv(hs2))))
  opeq12d(cfv(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), cfv(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), cv(hs3)), cfv(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)), cfv(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs3), cv(hs2)))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), cv(hs2), cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs3), cv(hs2), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(cfv(c1st, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(c1st, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3))))
  diff.hs3.c(cfv(c2nd, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(c2nd, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3))))
  diff.hs3.c(cop(cfv(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)), cfv(cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1)), cv(hs2))))

blocks.pretty:
thm xpmapen(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 × c1)[↦]c2)[≅]((c0[↦]c2)×(c1[↦]c2))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  xpmapenlem(hs2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, (hs3 ∈ c2 ↦(1st `(hs0 ` hs3))), (hs3 ∈ c2 ↦(2nd `(hs0 ` hs3))), (hs3 ∈ c2 ↦ <((1st ` hs1)` hs3),((2nd ` hs1)` hs3)>))
  cbvmptv(hs3, hs2, c2, (1st `(hs0 ` hs3)), (1st `(hs0 ` hs2)))
  2fveq3(hs3, hs2, c1st, hs0)
  cbvmptv(hs3, hs2, c2, (2nd `(hs0 ` hs3)), (2nd `(hs0 ` hs2)))
  2fveq3(hs3, hs2, c2nd, hs0)
  cbvmptv(hs3, hs2, c2, <((1st ` hs1)` hs3),((2nd ` hs1)` hs3)>, <((1st ` hs1)` hs2),((2nd ` hs1)` hs2)>)
  opeq12d(((1st ` hs1)` hs3), ((2nd ` hs1)` hs3), ((1st ` hs1)` hs2), ((2nd ` hs1)` hs2), hs3 = hs2)
  fveq2(hs3, hs2, (1st ` hs1))
  fveq2(hs3, hs2, (2nd ` hs1))
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c((hs3 ∈ c2 ↦(1st `(hs0 ` hs3))))
  diff.hs2.c((hs3 ∈ c2 ↦(2nd `(hs0 ` hs3))))
  diff.hs2.c((hs3 ∈ c2 ↦ <((1st ` hs1)` hs3),((2nd ` hs1)` hs3)>))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((hs3 ∈ c2 ↦ <((1st ` hs1)` hs3),((2nd ` hs1)` hs3)>))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c((hs3 ∈ c2 ↦(1st `(hs0 ` hs3))))
  diff.hs1.c((hs3 ∈ c2 ↦(2nd `(hs0 ` hs3))))
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c((1st `(hs0 ` hs2)))
  diff.hs2.c((1st `(hs0 ` hs3)))
  diff.hs3.c((2nd `(hs0 ` hs2)))
  diff.hs2.c((2nd `(hs0 ` hs3)))
  diff.hs3.c(<((1st ` hs1)` hs2),((2nd ` hs1)` hs2)>)
  diff.hs2.c(<((1st ` hs1)` hs3),((2nd ` hs1)` hs3)>)
}

thm mapunen(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

} = {
  en3d(hs0, hs1, co(c4, cmap, cun(c0, c2)), cxp(co(c4, cmap, c0), co(c4, cmap, c2)), cop(cres(cv(hs0), c0), cres(cv(hs0), c2)), cun(cfv(c1st, cv(hs1)), cfv(c2nd, cv(hs1))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)))
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wcel(co(c4, cmap, cun(c0, c2)), universe))
  ovex(c4, cmap, cun(c0, c2))
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wcel(cxp(co(c4, cmap, c0), co(c4, cmap, c2)), universe))
  xpex(co(c4, cmap, c0), co(c4, cmap, c2))
  ovex(c4, cmap, c0)
  ovex(c4, cmap, c2)
  syl5ibr(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c4, cmap, cun(c0, c2))), wcel(cop(cres(cv(hs0), c0), cres(cv(hs0), c2)), cxp(co(c4, cmap, c0), co(c4, cmap, c2))), wa(wf(cres(cv(hs0), c0), c0, c4), wf(cres(cv(hs0), c2), c2, c4)))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c4, cmap, cun(c0, c2))), wf(cres(cv(hs0), c0), c0, c4), wf(cres(cv(hs0), c2), c2, c4))
  sylancl(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c4, cmap, cun(c0, c2))), wf(cres(cv(hs0), c0), c0, c4), wf(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c2), c4), wss(c0, cun(c0, c2)))

  ssun2(c2, c0)
  fssres(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c2), c4, c2)
  syl5bb(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wcel(cop(cres(cv(hs0), c0), cres(cv(hs0), c2)), cxp(co(c4, cmap, c0), co(c4, cmap, c2))), wa(wf(cres(cv(hs0), c0), c0, c4), wf(cres(cv(hs0), c2), c2, c4)), wa(wcel(cres(cv(hs0), c0), co(c4, cmap, c0)), wcel(cres(cv(hs0), c2), co(c4, cmap, c2))))
  opelxp(cres(cv(hs0), c0), cres(cv(hs0), c2), co(c4, cmap, c0), co(c4, cmap, c2))
  anbi12d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)), wcel(cres(cv(hs0), c0), co(c4, cmap, c0)), wcel(cres(cv(hs0), c2), co(c4, cmap, c2)), wf(cres(cv(hs0), c0), c0, c4), wf(cres(cv(hs0), c2), c2, c4))
  elmapd(cres(cv(hs0), c0), c4, c0, c5, c1, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)))
  elmapd(cres(cv(hs0), c2), c4, c2, c5, c3, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(cin(c0, c2), emptycls)))

blocks.name: map2xp
blocks.content: A cardinal power with exponent 2 is equivalent to a Cartesian product with itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 17-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm map2xp(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmap, c2o), cen, cxp(c0, c0)))
} = {
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmap, c2o), cen, cxp(c0, c0)), wbr(co(c0, cmap, c2o), cen, cxp(co(c0, cmap, csn(emptycls)), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1o)))), wbr(cxp(co(c0, cmap, csn(emptycls)), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1o))), cen, cxp(c0, c0)))
  syl5eqbr(co(c0, cmap, c2o), cen, cxp(co(c0, cmap, csn(emptycls)), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1o))), co(c0, cmap, cun(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o))), wcel(c0, c1))
  oveq2i(c0, cmap, c2o, cun(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)))
  eqtri(c2o, cun(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)), cpr(emptycls, c1o))
  df2o3()
  df-pr(emptycls, c1o)
  syl31anc(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(co(c0, cmap, cun(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o))), cen, cxp(co(c0, cmap, csn(emptycls)), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1o)))), wcel(csn(emptycls), universe), wcel(csn(c1o), universe), wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cin(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)), emptycls))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csn(emptycls), universe))
  snex(emptycls)
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(csn(c1o), universe))
  snex(c1o)
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cin(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)), emptycls))
  mpbir(wceq(cin(csn(emptycls), csn(c1o)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1o, csn(emptycls))))
  mto(wcel(c1o, csn(emptycls)), wceq(c1o, emptycls))
  neii(c1o, emptycls)
  1n0()
  elsni(c1o, emptycls)
  disjsn(csn(emptycls), c1o)
  mapunen(csn(emptycls), universe, csn(c1o), universe, c0, c1)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(cxp(co(c0, cmap, csn(emptycls)), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1o))), cen, cxp(c0, c0)), wbr(co(c0, cmap, csn(emptycls)), cen, c0), wbr(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1o)), cen, c0))
  mapsnend(c0, emptycls, c1, universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, universe))
  0ex()
  mapsnend(c0, c1o, c1, universe, wcel(c0, c1))
  id(wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c1o, universe))
  1oex()
  xpen(co(c0, cmap, csn(emptycls)), c0, co(c0, cmap, csn(c1o)), c0)
  entr(co(c0, cmap, c2o), cxp(co(c0, cmap, csn(emptycls)), co(c0, cmap, csn(c1o))), cxp(c0, c0))
}

blocks.name: mapdom2
blocks.content: Order-preserving property of set exponentiation. Theorem 6L(d) of [Enderton] p. 149. (Contributed by NM, 23-Sep-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mapdom2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wn(wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))), wbr(co(c2, cmap, c0), cdom, co(c2, cmap, c1)))
} = {
  pm2.61d1(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wn(wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))), wbr(co(c2, cmap, c0), cdom, co(c2, cmap, c1)), wcel(c2, universe))
  ex(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wn(wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))), wcel(c2, universe), wbr(co(c2, cmap, c0), cdom, co(c2, cmap, c1)))
  an32s(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wn(wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls))), wcel(c2, universe), wbr(co(c2, cmap, c0), cdom, co(c2, cmap, c1)))
  pm2.61dane(c2, emptycls, wa(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)), wn(wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))), wbr(co(c2, cmap, c0), cdom, co(c2, cmap, c1)))
  syl6eqbr(co(c2, cmap, c0), cdom, co(c2, cmap, c1), emptycls, wa(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)), wn(wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))), wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  eqtrd(co(c2, cmap, c0), emptycls, co(emptycls, cmap, c0), wa(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)), wn(wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))), wceq(c2, emptycls)))
  oveq1d(c2, cmap, c0, emptycls, wa(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cdom, c1), wcel(c2, universe)), wn(wa(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c2, emptycls)))), wceq(c2, emptycls)))

blocks.name: mapdom3
blocks.content: Set exponentiation dominates the mantissa. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 17-Jul-2022.)

thm mapdom3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c2, emptycls)), wbr(c0, cdom, co(c0, cmap, c2)))

  n0(hs0, c2)
  exlimdv(hs0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, cdom, co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  3expia(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, cdom, co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(c0, cdom, co(c0, cmap, c2)), wbr(c0, cen, co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs0)))), wbr(co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs0))), cdom, co(c0, cmap, c2)))
  ensymd(c0, co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs0))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  mapsnend(c0, cv(hs0), c1, c2, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  sylancl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(co(c0, cmap, csn(cv(hs0))), cdom, co(c0, cmap, c2)), wbr(csn(cv(hs0)), cdom, c2), wn(wa(wceq(csn(cv(hs0)), emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls))))
  sylc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wbr(csn(cv(hs0)), cdom, c2), wcel(c2, c3), wss(csn(cv(hs0)), c2))

  ssdomg(c2, c3, csn(cv(hs0)))
  ax-mp(wn(wa(wceq(csn(cv(hs0)), emptycls), wceq(c0, emptycls))), wne(csn(cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  snnz(cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)

blocks.name: pwen
blocks.content: If two sets are equinumerous, then their power sets are equinumerous. Proposition 10.15 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 87. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwen(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, cpw(c1)))
} = {
  syl2anc(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, cpw(c1)), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c0)), wbr(co(c2o, cmap, c0), cen, cpw(c1)))
  syl(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(cpw(c0), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  brrelex1i(c0, cen, c1)
  pw2eng(c0, universe)
  syl2anc(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(co(c2o, cmap, c0), cen, cpw(c1)), wbr(co(c2o, cmap, c0), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c1)), wbr(co(c2o, cmap, c1), cen, cpw(c1)))
  mpan(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(co(c2o, cmap, c0), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c1)), wbr(c2o, cen, c2o))
  enref(c2o)
  elexi(c2o, com)
  2onn()
  mapen(c2o, c2o, c0, c1)
  3syl(wbr(c0, cen, c1), wbr(co(c2o, cmap, c1), cen, cpw(c1)), wcel(c1, universe), wbr(cpw(c1), cen, co(c2o, cmap, c1)))
  brrelex2i(c0, cen, c1)
  relen()
  pw2eng(c1, universe)
  ensym(cpw(c1), co(c2o, cmap, c1))
  entr(co(c2o, cmap, c0), co(c2o, cmap, c1), cpw(c1))
  entr(cpw(c0), co(c2o, cmap, c0), cpw(c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pwen(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[≅]c1 → P(c0)[≅]P(c1))
} = {
  syl2anc(c0[≅]c1, P(c0)[≅]P(c1), P(c0)[≅](2o[↦]c0), (2o[↦]c0)[≅]P(c1))
  syl(c0[≅]c1, P(c0)[≅](2o[↦]c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex1i(c0, cen, c1)
  pw2eng(c0, universe)
  syl2anc(c0[≅]c1, (2o[↦]c0)[≅]P(c1), (2o[↦]c0)[≅](2o[↦]c1), (2o[↦]c1)[≅]P(c1))
  mpan(c0[≅]c1, (2o[↦]c0)[≅](2o[↦]c1), 2o[≅]2o)
  enref(c2o)
  elexi(c2o, com)
  2onn()
  mapen(c2o, c2o, c0, c1)
  3syl(c0[≅]c1, (2o[↦]c1)[≅]P(c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌, P(c1)[≅](2o[↦]c1))
  brrelex2i(c0, cen, c1)
  relen()
  pw2eng(c1, universe)
  ensym(P(c1), (2o[↦]c1))
  entr((2o[↦]c0), (2o[↦]c1), P(c1))
  entr(P(c0), (2o[↦]c0), P(c1))
}

  bren(hs0, c0, c1)
  exlimiv(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wbr(cin(cpw(c0), cab(s0, wbr(cv(s0), cen, c2))), cen, cin(cpw(c1), cab(s0, wbr(cv(s0), cen, c2)))))
  en3d(hs1, hs2, cin(cpw(c0), cab(s0, wbr(cv(s0), cen, c2))), cin(cpw(c1), cab(s0, wbr(cv(s0), cen, c2))), cima(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs2)), wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  3syl(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wcel(cin(cpw(c0), cab(s0, wbr(cv(s0), cen, c2))), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
  syl6eqelr(c0, universe, cdm(cv(hs0)), wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1))
  f1odm(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  dmex(cv(hs0))

  3syl(wf1o(cv(hs0), c0, c1), wcel(cin(cpw(c1), cab(s0, wbr(cv(s0), cen, c2))), universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  pwexg(c1, universe)

thm ssenen(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3brtr3g({ s0 |(s0 ⊆ c0 ∧ s0[≅]c2)}, cen, { s0 |(s0 ⊆ c1 ∧ s0[≅]c2)}, (P(c0)⋂ { s0 | s0[≅]c2 }), (P(c1)⋂ { s0 | s0[≅]c2 }), c0[≅]c1)
  sylbi(c0[≅]c1, (P(c0)⋂ { s0 | s0[≅]c2 })[≅](P(c1)⋂ { s0 | s0[≅]c2 }), ∃(hs0,(hs0 : c0 ↔ c1)))
  bren(hs0, c0, c1)
  exlimiv(hs0, (hs0 : c0 ↔ c1), (P(c0)⋂ { s0 | s0[≅]c2 })[≅](P(c1)⋂ { s0 | s0[≅]c2 }))
  en3d(hs1, hs2, (P(c0)⋂ { s0 | s0[≅]c2 }), (P(c1)⋂ { s0 | s0[≅]c2 }), (hs0 " hs1), (`' hs0 " hs2), (hs0 : c0 ↔ c1))
  3syl((hs0 : c0 ↔ c1), (P(c0)⋂ { s0 | s0[≅]c2 })∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌, P(c0)∈ 𝕌)
  syl6eqelr(c0, universe, dom(hs0), (hs0 : c0 ↔ c1))
  f1odm(hs0, c0, c1)
  dmex(hs0)
  pwexg(c0, universe)
  inex1g(P(c0), universe, { s0 | s0[≅]c2 })

  pwexg(c1, universe)

  imbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0))), wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cen, csuc(c0)), wcel(cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0)), c1), wbr(cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0)), cen, csuc(cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0)))))
  eleq1(c0, cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0)), c1)
  breq12d(c0, cen, csuc(c0), cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0)), csuc(cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0))), wceq(c0, cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0))))
  id(wceq(c0, cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0))))
  suceq(c0, cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0)))
  limensuci(cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0)), c1)
  elimhyp(c0, con0, wlim(cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0))), wlim(c0), wlim(con0))
  limeq(c0, cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0)))
  limeq(con0, cif(c0, con0, wlim(c0)))
  limon()
}

thm limensuc(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ Lim(c0))→ c0[≅]suc(c0))
} = {
  impcom(c0 ∈ c1, Lim(c0), c0[≅]suc(c0))
  dedth(c0, con0, Lim(c0), (c0 ∈ c1 → c0[≅]suc(c0)), (if(Lim(c0), c0, On)∈ c1 → if(Lim(c0), c0, On)[≅]suc(if(Lim(c0), c0, On))))
  imbi12d(c0 = if(Lim(c0), c0, On), c0 ∈ c1, c0[≅]suc(c0), if(Lim(c0), c0, On)∈ c1, if(Lim(c0), c0, On)[≅]suc(if(Lim(c0), c0, On)))
  eleq1(c0, if(Lim(c0), c0, On), c1)
  breq12d(c0, cen, suc(c0), if(Lim(c0), c0, On), suc(if(Lim(c0), c0, On)), c0 = if(Lim(c0), c0, On))
  id(c0 = if(Lim(c0), c0, On))
  suceq(c0, if(Lim(c0), c0, On))
  limensuci(if(Lim(c0), c0, On), c1)
  elimhyp(c0, con0, Lim(if(Lim(c0), c0, On)), Lim(c0), Lim(On))
  limeq(c0, if(Lim(c0), c0, On))
  limeq(con0, if(Lim(c0), c0, On))
  limon()
}

blocks.name: infensuc
blocks.content: Any infinite ordinal is equinumerous to its successor. Exercise 7 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 88. Proved without the Axiom of Infinity. (Contributed by NM, 30-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2013.)

  breq12d(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs0)), com, csuc(com), wceq(cv(hs0), com))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), com))
  suceq(cv(hs0), com)
  breq12d(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1), csuc(cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

  limom()
  ad2antrr(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wcel(com, con0), wss(com, cv(hs1)), wi(wbr(cv(hs1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(csuc(cv(hs1)), cen, csuc(csuc(cv(hs1))))))
  com12(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wbr(cv(hs1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(csuc(cv(hs1)), cen, csuc(csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  mpan2(wbr(cv(hs1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wi(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wbr(csuc(cv(hs1)), cen, csuc(csuc(cv(hs1))))), wbr(csn(cv(hs1)), cen, csn(csuc(cv(hs1)))))
  mp2an(wbr(csn(cv(hs1)), cen, csn(csuc(cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs1), universe), wcel(csuc(cv(hs1)), universe))
  sucex(cv(hs1))
  vex(hs1)
  en2sn(cv(hs1), universe, csuc(cv(hs1)), universe)
  syl5(wa(wbr(cv(hs1), cen, csuc(cv(hs1))), wbr(csn(cv(hs1)), cen, csn(csuc(cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wbr(csuc(cv(hs1)), cen, csuc(csuc(cv(hs1)))), wa(wceq(cin(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs1))), emptycls), wceq(cin(csuc(cv(hs1)), csn(csuc(cv(hs1)))), emptycls)))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs1))), emptycls), wceq(cin(csuc(cv(hs1)), csn(csuc(cv(hs1)))), emptycls))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs1), con0), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs1))), emptycls), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), cv(hs1))))

  eloni(csuc(cv(hs1)))

  unen(cv(hs1), csuc(cv(hs1)), csn(cv(hs1)), csn(csuc(cv(hs1))))

  diff.hs1.w(wbr(cv(hs0), cen, csuc(cv(hs0))))

thm infensuc(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ On ∧ _om ⊆ c0)→ c0[≅]suc(c0))
} = {
  mpd((c0 ∈ On ∧ _om ⊆ c0), c0[≅]suc(c0), _om ∈ On)
  nsyl2((c0 ∈ On ∧ _om ⊆ c0), _om ∈ On, _om = On)
  nsyl3((c0 ∈ On ∧ _om ⊆ c0), _om = On, _om ∈ 𝕌)
  mtbiri(_om = On, _om ∈ 𝕌, On ∈ 𝕌)
  onprc()
  eleq1(com, con0, universe)
  ancoms(c0 ∈ On, _om ⊆ c0, _om ∈ 𝕌)
  ssexg(com, c0, con0)
  ori(_om ∈ On, _om = On)
  omon()
  imp(c0 ∈ On, _om ⊆ c0, (_om ∈ On → c0[≅]suc(c0)))
  com23(c0 ∈ On, _om ⊆ c0, _om ∈ On, c0[≅]suc(c0))
  exp31(c0 ∈ On, _om ∈ On, _om ⊆ c0, c0[≅]suc(c0))
  tfindsg(hs0, hs1, c0, com, c0[≅]suc(c0), hs0[≅]suc(hs0), _om[≅]suc(_om), hs1[≅]suc(hs1), suc(hs1)[≅]suc(suc(hs1)))
  breq12d(hs0, cen, suc(hs0), com, suc(_om), hs0 = _om)
  id(hs0 = _om)
  suceq(hs0, com)
  breq12d(hs0, cen, suc(hs0), hs1, suc(hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  id(hs0 = hs1)
  suceq(hs0, hs1)
  breq12d(hs0, cen, suc(hs0), suc(hs1), suc(suc(hs1)), hs0 = suc(hs1))
  id(hs0 = suc(hs1))
  suceq(hs0, suc(hs1))
  breq12d(hs0, cen, suc(hs0), c0, suc(c0), hs0 = c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  suceq(hs0, c0)
  limensuci(com, con0)
  limom()
  ad2antrr(hs1 ∈ On, _om ∈ On, _om ⊆ hs1, (hs1[≅]suc(hs1)→ suc(hs1)[≅]suc(suc(hs1))))
  com12(hs1 ∈ On, hs1[≅]suc(hs1), suc(hs1)[≅]suc(suc(hs1)))
  mpan2(hs1[≅]suc(hs1), (hs1 ∈ On → suc(hs1)[≅]suc(suc(hs1))), { hs1 }[≅]{ suc(hs1)})
  mp2an({ hs1 }[≅]{ suc(hs1)}, hs1 ∈ 𝕌, suc(hs1)∈ 𝕌)
  sucex(hs1)
  vex(hs1)
  en2sn(hs1, universe, suc(hs1), universe)
  syl5((hs1[≅]suc(hs1)∧ { hs1 }[≅]{ suc(hs1)}), hs1 ∈ On, suc(hs1)[≅]suc(suc(hs1)), ((hs1 ⋂ { hs1 })= ∅ ∧(suc(hs1)⋂ { suc(hs1)})= ∅))
  jca(hs1 ∈ On, (hs1 ⋂ { hs1 })= ∅, (suc(hs1)⋂ { suc(hs1)})= ∅)
  sylibr(hs1 ∈ On, (hs1 ⋂ { hs1 })= ∅, ¬ hs1 ∈ hs1)
  syl(hs1 ∈ On, ¬ hs1 ∈ hs1, Ord(hs1))
  eloni(hs1)
  ordirr(hs1)
  disjsn(hs1, hs1)
  3imtr4i(hs1 ∈ On, (suc(hs1)⋂ { suc(hs1)})= ∅, suc(hs1)∈ On, ¬ suc(hs1)∈ suc(hs1))
  syl(suc(hs1)∈ On, ¬ suc(hs1)∈ suc(hs1), Ord(suc(hs1)))
  eloni(suc(hs1))
  ordirr(suc(hs1))
  sucelon(hs1)
  disjsn(suc(hs1), suc(hs1))
  ex((hs1[≅]suc(hs1)∧ { hs1 }[≅]{ suc(hs1)}), ((hs1 ⋂ { hs1 })= ∅ ∧(suc(hs1)⋂ { suc(hs1)})= ∅), suc(hs1)[≅]suc(suc(hs1)))
  3brtr4g(suc(hs1), cen, suc(suc(hs1)), (hs1 ⋃ { hs1 }), (suc(hs1)⋃ { suc(hs1)}), ((hs1[≅]suc(hs1)∧ { hs1 }[≅]{ suc(hs1)})∧((hs1 ⋂ { hs1 })= ∅ ∧(suc(hs1)⋂ { suc(hs1)})= ∅)))
  unen(hs1, suc(hs1), { hs1 }, { suc(hs1)})
  df-suc(hs1)
  df-suc(suc(hs1))
  a1d(((Lim(hs0)∧ _om ∈ On)∧ _om ⊆ hs0), ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0,(_om ⊆ hs1 → hs1[≅]suc(hs1))), hs0[≅]suc(hs0))
  ad2antrr(Lim(hs0), _om ∈ On, _om ⊆ hs0, hs0[≅]suc(hs0))
  mpan(Lim(hs0), hs0[≅]suc(hs0), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  limensuc(hs0, universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(com)
  diff.hs1.c(com)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[≅]suc(c0))
  diff.hs0.w(hs1[≅]suc(hs1))
  diff.hs0.w(suc(hs1)[≅]suc(suc(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.w(hs0[≅]suc(hs0))
}
